head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DRESNER, RABBI SAMUEL H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DRESNER, RABBI SAMUEL H.

block.p: DRESNER-Rabbi Samuel H. Age 76. Rabbi, teacher, author. Saturday, April 29, 2000, 25 Nisan 5760. Visiting professor of philosophy, Jewish Theological Seminary of America. Rabbi Emeritus Moriah Congregation, Deerfield, IL. Author of significant works in the areas of Hasidism and Jewish life in America. Beloved husband of Ruth, dear brother of Helen Hochfelder and Ruth Sajowitz and the late Al Dresner. Loving father of Hannah Dresner, Miriam Klausner (Mitchell), Dr. Nehama Dresner (Dr. Christopher Randolph) and Dr. Rachel Dresner (David Jacobs). Proud grandfather of Elisheva, Elena, Joseph, Moshe, Connor, Avi, Adele, Deena, Sarah, Meghan, Elisha, Yonatan, and Akiva. Funeral services will be held at Conservative Synagogue Adath Israel of Riverdale, 250th Street and Henry Hudson Parkway, Monday, May 1, 11 AM.
